application.6: Permission for Activities Beyond Visa Status
application.10: Report of Change in Registration Details

application.1: When you first come to Korea, you register your personal information. It‚Äôs like a resident registration card.
application.2: When your card is lost or damaged, you can get a new one.
application.3: Permission to extend your stay if you want to stay longer in Korea.
application.4: Apply when you want to change your current visa status. Example: Student ‚Üí Work.
application.5: Getting a visa status for the first time in Korea.
application.6: Permission to do activities not allowed under your original visa. Example: A student wants to work part-time.
application.7: You must report or get permission when changing or adding a workplace.
application.8: Required when leaving and re-entering Korea. Single: one entry. Multiple: multiple entries.
application.9: Report when your residence in Korea changes.
application.10: Report when registered information like name or passport number changes.
